name: The Catacombs of Solaris (original)
description:
This is the original name-your-own-price version of Catacombs of Solaris. If you're looking for Catacombs of Solaris Revisited, please go here.

The goal of this game is to find your favourite room in the catacombs.

Controls: use WASD or arrow keys and mouse. Esc to quit. Most controllers should work too.
